titleStmt.title: An appendix to a late book intituled The unchangeable morality of the seventh-day-Sabbath. Or, A letter written to some friends, for further satisfaction in that point: by William Seller, in the behalf of himself and several other brethren
titleStmt.author: Saller, William, d. ca. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Last page of text begins: Postscript; in fact an advertisment.
In response to "The unchangeable morality of the 7th day sabbath" written by J.S.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
